Research Assistant Position in Transport-Regulated Plant Immunity

Applications are invited for a postdoctoral researcher to join the Laboratory of Prof. Jonathan Jones to study genomic diversity of intracellular plant immune receptor genes.

  • 07 September 2018

Dept. of Earth and Space Science and Engineering
Lassonde School of Engineering, York University
Room 312, Petrie Science & Engineering Building
4700 Keele St., Toronto, ON M3J 1P3, Canada
